sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnntwrksvcmntrngloginfo ( SYS_IP , sys_port , sys_nm , mntrng_sttus , log_info , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , log_id ) VALUES ( #sysIp# , #sysPort# , #sysNm# , #mntrngSttus# , #logInfo# , #creatDt# , #frstRegisterId# , #frstRegistPnttm# , #lastUpdusrId# , #lastUpdtPnttm# , #logId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnntwrksvcmntrngloginfo SET sys_ip = #sysIp# , sys_port = #sysPort# , sys_nm = #sysNm# , mntrng_sttus = #mntrngSttus# , log_info = #logInfo# , creat_dt = #creatDt# , frst_register_id = #frstRegisterId# , frst_regist_pnttm = #frstRegistPnttm# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# , log_id = #logId# WHERE sys_ip = #sysIp# AND sys_port = #sysPort# AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnntwrksvcmntrngloginfo WHERE sys_ip = #sysIp# AND sys_port = #sysPort# AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT sys_ip , sys_port , sys_nm , mntrng_sttus , log_info , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , log_id FROM comtnntwrksvcmntrngloginfo WHERE sys_ip = #sysIp# AND sys_port = #sysPort# AND log_id = #logId#

SELECT sys_ip , sys_port , sys_nm , mntrng_sttus , log_info , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , log_id FROM comtnntwrksvcmntrngloginfo WHERE 1=1
sys_ip = #searchKeyword#
sys_port LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY sys_ip DESC , sys_port DESC , log_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnntwrksvcmntrngloginfo WHERE 1=1
sys_ip = #searchKeyword#
sys_port LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
